name: Pooja'sKitchenTips
0:
”Alexa, open pooja's kitchen tips”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pooja's kitchen tips
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pooja's Kitchen Tips is your destination for creative, interesting and helpful kitchen tips,tricks and some useful recipe ideas. The content is played in the voice of Pooja Khanna, who runs a popular food blog at 2blissofbaking.com

The skill provides you a new tip daily. You can also listen to previous day's tip. 

The content of the skill is in Hindi. 

For more kitchen tips and recipes ideas, you can visit our website at www.2blissofbaking.com. 

For any technical queries , please reach out to hello@digitalripples.ai
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
